description: Just a really nice wordle-like gnome native app. Love how it looks, just works fantastically.
Really well made. Just make the words easier please.
A really good GNOME app, thank you a lot!

App is nice and snappy and the UI is fairly polished. A couple nitpicks:

1. It would be nice if when you hit play again that it just started another puzzle, rather than taking you back to the initial screen of the app.

2. The words are...very strange. Much more obscure than in Wordle. I don't really mind because I like the challenge, and learning new words. Someone who really wanted a perfect clone of Wordle may not enjoy that aspect though.

3. A play history would be nice...just the ability to see what words you've done. Maybe even to see your guesses for previous words? Might be asking a lot.

Thanks for making this.
summary: Nice clean app, good Wordle substitute with a caveat

description: Typically, wordle generates words from a much shorter list of common words but lets less common words be entered as guesses. This seems to use all english words as potential answers, which makes it very difficult. The keyboard also displayed the wrong colors sometimes.
summary: Well made, but no difficulty options, bugs

description: This app is very well made and fun to play, but there are too many nonsense words. There either needs to be a change in source, or some sort of manual filtering done.

it is wordle, it plays okay, but the OSK is not big enough, and a good chunk of the words seems to be nonsense.. maybe some settings for that would be nice, as it's not fun to try to guess words most people have *never* heard of.
Кто русский словарь писал? Откуда каких-то левых сов набрали.
Да, по крайней мере русский словарь здесь неширок, но это не мешает мне заходить в неё почти каждый день и поиграть 8-10 минут от скукоты.
